children.text: Jude Law (Sherlock Holmes) is at his charming best in this update of the classic comedy also starring Marisa Tomei, Omar Epps, Nia Long, Jane Krakowski, Siena Miller, and Susan Sarandon. When the consequences of his playboy lifestyle suddenly affect the women in his life and his best friend (Epps), Alfie (Law) begins to wonder if there is more to life than these fleeting romances. And if so, what's it all about?
Jude Law, Marisa Tomei, Omar Epps, Nia Long, Jane Krakowski, Siena Miller, Susan Sarandon, Rene Taylor, Dick Latessa, Jefferson Mays
This title is no longer available.

Al Pacino, Jack Lemmon, Alec Baldwin, Ed Harris, and Kevin Spacey shine in this powerful story set in the world of real estate. Glengarry Glen Ross is a riveting tale of desperation and betrayal based on David Mamet's Pulitzer Prize-winning play.
Al Pacino, Alec Baldwin, Jack Lemmon, Ed Harris, Kevin Spacey, Alan Arkin, Jonathan Pryce
This title is no longer available.
